	'Twas a "test" to 'remember' in the '90s.
'Twas a "test" to 'remember' in the '90s.

	It was --- in a sense --- really... interesting.
It was --- in a sense --- really... interesting.

	I -- too -- met << some curly quotes >> there or <<here>>No space.
I -- too -- met << some curly quotes >> there or <<here>>No space.

	
	She was 6\"12\'.
> She was 6\"12\'.
